siwil aarakshaka departhamenthuwe bhatayan thidenaku wisin polonnaruwa - madakalapuwa dumriya margaye kotaliya pradeshayedi dumriya margaye ana ha thahadu galawima nisa madakalapuwa sita kolambaa bala dhawanaya wu (16) rathri thapal dumriya anathurakin beraganimata polonnaruwa polis sthanadhipathi duminda senanayaka mahathata haki wi thibe.me dumriya margaye ana ha yakada thahadu galawima nisa anathurak siduwimata idakada thibu bawa polonnaruwa ha madakalapuwa dumriya sthanadhipathiwaru dinamina kala wimasumakadi sanatha kalaha.polonnaruwa polis sthanadhipathi duminda senanayaka mahatha medina rathri kaduruwela sita manampitiya desata jip rathayen gaman ganiddi kotaliya palama asala sakakatayuthu thriwil rathayak nawatha thibuna heyin ohu ee pilibandawa pariksha kota thibe.ehi nila andumin sarasi siti siwil aarakshaka bhatayan thidenaku da sita atha.
